12 int main(int argc, char **argv)
13 {
14  // init ros node
15  init(argc, argv, "rois");
16  NodeHandle nh;
17 
18  // roi library
19  rois rois_lib;
20 
21  // advertise services
22  ServiceServer get_all = nh.advertiseService("rois/get_all", &rois::get_all, &rois_lib);
23  ServiceServer get_closest_service = nh.advertiseService("rois/get_closest", &rois::get_closest, &rois_lib);
24  ServiceServer get_distance_service = nh.advertiseService("rois/get_distance", &rois::get_distance, &rois_lib);
25  ServiceServer get_map_service = nh.advertiseService("rois/get_map", &rois::get_map, &rois_lib);
26  ServiceServer reload_service = nh.advertiseService("rois/reload", &rois::reload, &rois_lib);
27 
28  ROS_DEBUG("ROI_PROV - ROI services are ready");
29  spin();
30 
31  return 0;
